page.title: 10ABERDYFI CHILDHOOD (1910)
page.content: { Mr.H.M.Lewis,born in Aberdyfi in {the year 1910,recalled his childhood {during a talk to school children on {3rd June 1985. Homelife was mostly happy and simple.Although families were poor the children were almost always clean and well fed.Few homes had bathrooms and the weekly bath was taken in front of the kitchen fire on a Saturday evening Everyone used the same water in a small tin bath.A fresh kettle of boiling water was used to heat up the bath for the next child. Children had to make their own entertainment.In the summer months water games were popular.A game called 'DUCK'in which a good swimmer had to dive and swim under water to avoid capture was always great fun.During the winter evenings they played round the kitchen fire with toy soldiers.
